description.name: PayFlow Pro
description.tagline: A merchant gateway solution from PayPal.
description.long:
Payflow Gateway is PayPal's secure and open payment gateway. Using the Payflow Gateway APIs, merchants can process debit and credit card payments, PayPal, PayPal CreditÂ®, authorizations, captures, and credit voids.

Payflow Gateway merchants can choose to process their online store payments with any major payment processor, bank, or card association.
